Short red hair, blue eyes. According to\n<Laun>
Dulpe she was about Kaleb's height. She
was part of of the capital city's guards
and was sent here to purchase weapons.
Dulpe says it was love at first sight,

A few years after Kaleb was born, though,
a disease suddenly popped up in another

Yeah. Apparently she's a real adventure

My dad said she left a few months after I

Why did she leave if she still loved dad?

Don't worry. I'm sure you'll meet her. If

Of course, Amber. Dulpe plans on leaving
town with Kaleb and I once the bandits
are taken care of. I'm sure that he'd let
you come along to look for your mom too.\n<Laun>
Thanks, Laun. I'll take you up on that.
We'll have to ask my dad's permission
Sorry. I shouldn't have brought you here.\n<Laun>
It's not your fault. It's just been on my
mind so much lately. Sometimes, I can
almost feel her trying to reach me. Or...
You should take that as a good sign. That
must mean she's thinking of you too.\n<Laun>
Yeah... You're right. I'm sure she wants
to meet me just as badly. Maybe even more!\n<Amber>
That's the spirit. Come on. We've got
Come on, Laun. We've gotta work hard!\n<Amber>
My dad talks about mom a lot.\n<Kaleb>
